## Installing RStudio

::: {.callout-tip}
To make RStuido look better, you may want to install the fira font. Instruction can be found [here](https://github.com/tonsky/FiraCode/wiki/RStudio-instructions) and [here](https://firacode.org/using-fira-code-ligatures-in-rstudio/).

Without Fira, you code could look like this: 
```{r}
#| eval: false
x
```
:::
